name: Darksiders
description:
GOG versi√≥n para intel

Nivel: Gold

files.game: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG
- x360ce_dinput8: https://lutris.net/files/tools/x360ce-dinput8.tar.gz
- d3dcompiler_42: http://download.game155.com/zip/d3dcompiler_42.dll.zip
game:
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: x360ce_dinput8
- extract:
    dst: drive_c/windows/system32/
    file: d3dcompiler_42
- task:
    app: quartz
    description: Installing Quartz
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    app: devenum
    description: Installing devenum
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    app: wmp9
    description: Installing Windows Media Player 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    description: Installing DirectX 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    app: amstream
    description: Installing amstream
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
wines:
  overrides:
    dinput8: native,builtin
    xinput1_3: builtin
  xinput: true
